name: Skok (Khaligufzel)
description:
You wake up alone in this unknown place. Everything looks alien to you... the walls, ceiling, and floor are made out of... flesh and metal?

It's up to you to figure out where are you and how to get home!

In this retro First Person Shooter with RPG elements, you will encounter many enemies that you will have to Rip and Tear™ through to find the answers you are looking for.

The skok-pre-pre-pre-alpha-mini-demo version of the game includes:

- Two weapons that SOUND and feel just RIGHT,

- A few enemy types,

- Modern, but also retro feeling graphics,

- Dynamic lighting,

- Music that will make you want to hear MORE about future updates of the game!

- Few minutes of gameplay.

The game is updated every day, working on it full time- including weekends!

From a fan... to fans! :)

Planned game features:

- Many UNIQUE weapons that SOUND and FEEL good!

- Upgrading/modifying weapons,

- Many different perks for your character, changing the game massively,

- Interesting story with original characters,

- Long, but full of action gameplay,

- Different enemy types with different behavior,

- And many more!

Make sure to leave your comment with any features that YOU would like to see (it's for fans of the genre, remember guys!?)!

---Credits:---
